question: For each item on this list, tell me if you think it is happening a lot more, somewhat more, only a little more or not more these days than five years ago: trade and business ties between your country and other countries.
raw_output:
I believe trade and business ties between my country and other countries are only a little more than five years ago, given the fluctuations in global economic activity, trade policies, and recent disruptions like the COVID-19 pandemic. While some levels of growth may have occurred due to new partnerships or technological advancements, overall increases seem modest. Therefore, I select "C" because the growth appears to be relatively minor compared to the past five years.

ANSWER: C
